H0.text: who played lionel in as time goes by. Judi Dench's husband Michael Williams

H1.text: who played lionel in as time goes by. Richard Briers

H2.text: who played lionel in as time goes by. Philip Bretherton

H3.text: who played lionel in as time goes by. Geoffrey Dyson Palmer

A4.text: Lionel Hardcastle (Geoffrey Palmer) – a retired coffee planter who spent most of his adult life in Kenya.

A5.text: Palmer later starred opposite Judi Dench for over a decade in another BBC sitcom, As Time Goes By (1992–2005).
